import Upgrades from "./Upgrades" function HelperShop({incrementDps, totalMoney, updateMoney}) { return (

Helper Shop

purchaseHelper(cost, dps)} /> this.handleLuckUpgrade(cost)} /> this.handleMoneyCountUpgrade(cost)} />
) function purchaseHelper(cost, dps) { console.log(cost,dps) if(totalMoney-cost<0) return updateMoney(cost*-1) incrementDps(dps) } } export default HelperShop
